ruleBookInfo.author:
@js:
result=String(java.getString('.gray@html')).replace(/.*\<\/span\>(.*?)\<br\>\<span.*\s*.*/g,'$1')
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
let sleep = Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep;
let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*401);
sleep(600-tim);
if (baseUrl.match(/http/)){
let base64 = java.base64Encode(baseUrl);
let result = `data:;base64,${base64},{"type":"url"}`;
java.put('url',result)
let url = java.base64Decode(base64);
java.ajax(url);}else{
java.ajax(java.hexDecodeToString(result))
}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.intro:
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(","); x=v[0] let name=String(java.getString('h4@html')).replace(/.*span\>(.*?)\<.*/g,'$1') let author=String(java.getString('.gray@html')).replace(/.*\<\/span\>(.*?)\\1){ let pl = '\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新'; r2=String(java.getString('.ulrow>li@html',po)); r2 = r2.replace(/.*
  • (.*)<\/em>(.*?)\：<\/b>[S\s]+?

    (.*?)<.*/g,'\n­\n⛄【$2】：\n$3\n时间：$1'); result=intro+pl+r2 result=r2?result:intro }else if(x==1){ let pl = '\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新'; r2=String(java.getString('.ulrow>li@html',po)); r2 = r2.replace(/.*

  • (.*)<\/em>(.*?)\：<\/b>[S\s]+?

    (.*?)<.*/g,'\n­\n⛄【$2】：\n$3\n时间：$1'); result = intro + pl + r2 result = r2? result : intro }else if(x==0){ result = intro; }
ruleBookInfo.kind:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x = v[1];
if(x==0){
p=String(java.getString('.mt.1@a@text')).replace(/\n/g,',')
}else{
p=String(java.getString('.gray@a@text')).replace(/.*编辑/g,'').replace(/\n/g,',');
}
java.put('kind',p)
result=p;
</js>

p=result.match(/bid\=(.*?)\'\,\s/)[1]||1;

let pi=`${url}read/${p}.html`
let base64 = java.base64Encode(pi)
result = `data:;base64,${base64},{"type":""}`;
</js>

ruleExplore.author:
<js>
if(String(result).match(/jieqi\_token/)){
result=null
	}else{
result=String(java.getString('a.0@html')).replace(/.*fss\"\>\/(.*?)\<\/.*/g,'$1')
}
</js>
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
ml=java.getString('title.0@html')
if(baseUrl.match(/login/)){
java.toast('\n❗请登录账号❗')
}else
if(String(ml).match(/我的书架/)){
java.getElements('tr!0')
		}else {
java.getElements('#jieqi_page_contents@tr')
			}
</js>
ruleExplore.bookUrl:
<js>
if(String(result).match(/自动订阅/)){
url=java.getString('a.0@html').match(/read\/(\d+)\./)[1]||1;
result=`{{getUrl()}}book/${url}.html`
	}else
if(String(result).match(/jieqi\_token/)){
url=java.getString('a.0@html').match(/aid\=(\d+)\.html/)[1]||1;
result=`{{getUrl()}}book/${url}.html`
}else{
result=java.getString('a.0@href')
			}
`data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(result)},{"type":""}`
</js>
ruleExplore.coverUrl:
<js>
if(String(result).match(/自动订阅/)){
url=java.getString('a.0@html').match(/read\/(\d+)\./)[1]||1;
}else
if(String(result).match(/jieqi\_token/)){
url=java.getString('a.0@html').match(/aid\=(\d+)\&/)[1]||1;
}else{
url=java.getString('a.0@html').match(/\/(\d+)\.html/)[1]||1;
			}
bid = parseInt(url);
aid = parseInt(bid / 1000);
result = `${moo}files/article/image/${aid}/${bid}/${bid}s.jpg`;
</js>
ruleExplore.name:
<js>

java.getString('a.0@text')
	}else{
result=String(java.getString('a.0@html')).replace(/.*\>(.*?)\<span.*/g,'$1')
			}
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
java.setContent(cache.get('urlss') );
cache.delete('urlss');
let r1 = java.getString('#content .blockcontent@text');
if (r1.includes("错误原因")) {java.longToast(r1);result=[];}
else {
result = java.getElement('#jieqi_page_contents .c_row||#jieqi_page_contents tr');
}
result
</js>

let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*401);
sleep(600-tim);
java.ajax(java.hexDecodeToString(result))
</js>
dl@.index@dd,dt
ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
uri=getUrl();
let ol=moo;
url=String(java.getString('a@href')).replace(/${ol}/g,`${uri}`)
let base64 = java.base64Encode(url)
result = `data:;base64,${base64},{"type":""}`;
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x = v[1];
let url = `${getUrl()}modules/article/search.php`;
let uri=`data:;base64,辞晨,{"type":""}`;
try {{
	url +=	`?searchkey=${key}&searchtype=all&page=${page}`
	ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
				}
code = ss.statusCode();
if (code==302||code==301) {
	uri=ss.header("location");
	}
	else if (code == 200) {
	cache.put('urlss', ss.body());
	}else if (code == 502) {
		java.toast('\n'+'👻ip被拉黑了👻')
}
	}catch(err) {
		java.log('💔访问出错💔')
		java.toast('\n💔访问出错，请换接口💔')
	}
	uri;
</js>
